verses.name: Ezekiel 47:13
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; This shall be the border, whereby ye shall inherit the land according to the twelve tribes of Israel: Joseph shall have two portions.

verses.name: Ezekiel 47:14
verses.text: And ye shall inherit it, one as well as another: concerning the which I lifted up mine hand to give it unto your fathers: and this land shall fall unto you for inheritance.

verses.name: Ezekiel 47:15
verses.text: And this shall be the border of the land toward the north side, from the great sea, the way of Hethlon, as men go to Zedad;
